node.title: Sexual Purity: Lost & Found
node.description: Danielle’s past experiences enable her to address many of the challenging issues facing our young people today.  Same-sex attraction, sexual sin, broken relationships, and a deep aching void that nothing could fill.  Yet after her long dark night, joy came in the morning, and God has since helped her to see more clearly a tracing from cause to effect in her life.  She will be sharing her personal testimony, especially as it relates to sexual purity.
